description: The United Arab Emirates has paid for the killing of its political enemies in Yemen, whistleblowers say.
maintext: Through the course of the investigation, we also spoke to more than a dozen other Yemeni sources who said this had been the case. They included two men who said they had carried out assassinations which were not terror-related, after being trained to do so by Emirati soldiers - and one man who said he had been offered release from a UAE prison in exchange for the assassination of a senior Yemeni political figure, a mission he did not accept.
title: UAE has funded political assassinations in Yemen, BBC finds
